EmailTemplate.name: 01_06_2016 Holiday Send Thank You.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You For Being A Green Circle Guardian | vColoring Book Donates $2,000 To EWB
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank You For Being A Green Circle Guardian. Because You Downloaded, We Donated Over $2,000 To Engineers Without Borders <[[http://vmturbo.com/resources/thx-holiday2015-the-vmturbo-vcoloring-book-thank-you/?utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vcoloring-book-2015&utm_content=01062016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}}, Last month, we invited you to enjoy our vColoring Book, The Adventures of The Green Circle Guardians <[[http://vmturbo.com/resources/thx-holiday2015-the-vmturbo-vcoloring-book-thank-you/?utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vcoloring-book-2015&utm_content=01062016]]>and pledged to donate $1 per download from December 17th to December 30th. Thanks to your download and of several thousand others, we just sent a check to Engineers Without Borders for more than $2000. Thank you for being a Green Circle Guardian. We invite you to join The Green Circle Community <[[http://greencircle.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vcoloring-book-2015&utm_content=01062016]]>, VMTurbo's online community of virtualization & cloud experts and forward-thinking IT Pros, completely free, for more tips, tools, and content. Happy New Year and THANK YOU, - The VMTurbo Team
